Sentencas: In this work, detailed mathematical models of a hybrid system of an IT-SOFC (intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell) and a GT (gas turbine) that is fueled by gasified biomass gas are built.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: Under the constraints of the working temperature of the fuel cell, mean axial temperature gradient, compressor surge, and turbine inlet temperature, the effects of operating parameters on the hybrid system are investigated mainly including RS (rotational speed), F/A (fuel/air) ratio, and S/C (steam/carbon) ratio.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency is 59.24% under the design condition.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: The power and efficiency of the system both decrease as the RS increases, with the latter decreasing from 60.95% to 49.08%.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: If the RS is too low, the system operation goes beyond the safety zone.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: In this situation, both the fuel cell and the turbine may be subjected to excess temperatures, and the compressor may easily surge.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: The efficiency increases from 56.5% to 61.34% with increasing F/A ratio, but an extremely high F/A ratio can cause the turbine to suffer from excess temperature.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: The efficiency decreases from 61.12% to 56.8% with increasing S/C ratio.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: The following two conclusions are drawn.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: First, the F/A ratio has the greatest influence on the performance of the hybrid system, i.e., its adjustment can effectively change the load in a wide range.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine

Sentencas: Second, the RS and S/C ratio are suitable for load adjustment in a narrow range.
Titulo: Effect of operating parameters on a hybrid system of intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine
